Posts.Content: Hello,,,,on 28th sept,i had a mammogram,,,,i have been recalled to my local hospital, for an appt. on Tuesday, 15th October,i contacted the the breast care nurse,and she told me that it was "low concern",,, i had biopsies done on a cyst last sept,but was told,they would just leave it,,,,,but i am now terrified,,,,just dont know which way to turn at the minute. thankyou in advance.
Posts.Title: New to this,,,advice needed please.
